channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tent., 12th October
item.description:
Tent on Butterfield Green. Is it the same one that was in Clissold in August?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spenser Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti tags sprayed on wall at Pope's Road Brixton SW9. The location is on the same side as Sports Direct Brixton branch. The graffiti has been there for over a month., 12th October
item.description:
Graffiti tags have been sprayed along a wall at Pope's Road SW9. The graffiti is on the same side as Sports Direct. There are more visible tags as you proceed down that same road. The graffiti tags have been there for over a month. Please can they be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pope's Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tunnel in the play area still mot fixed, 12th October
item.description:

item.title: Trees marked with red, 12th October
item.description:
I had assumed that maybe these multiple trees at the end of Wickham Way near the Chinese Roundabout are marked as requiring new tree ties. But why would red paint be sprayed on the actual tree? Is this vandalism?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Wickham Way, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wheelie bins left on pavement - overflowing & disgusting, 12th October
item.description:
Too many bins, too many residents not knowing how to separate waste/ when particular waste is meant to be collected. BINS SHOULDN’T STILL BE ON THE PAVEMENTS 4 DAYS AFTER COLLECTING DAY!!!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dengerous building, 12th October
item.description:
URGENT: Wilton Way 71a - mortar and stones falling from building onto pathway. Shop nearby confirms this happened before. Serious health & safety risk. A cement block just missed us by 3 meters!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Graham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree overhanging the road and pavement on Romney Drive, opposite No 62, 12th October
item.description:
There is a dying ash tree that has not grown vertically, but at an angle and then horizontally over the pavement and the road. It grows from private land to the south east of and fenced off from Romney Drive. The road and pavement are used daily by children and parents for access to Scotts Park School. As the tree dies the danger of it falling and causing injury or damage increases.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Romney Drive, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped furniture and sacks of rubbish, 12th October
item.description:
There is a skip on the parking bay rear of 25 Sennen Walk.it been hired by 7 Sennen Walk. Someone has fly tipped furniture and sacks on the roadway by the skip

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shottery Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pikes of rubbish on top of Micky’s commercial waste, 12th October
item.description:
Boxes of stuff, litter and commercial waste from last night all delightfully mashed u together after a night of fox and human revelry. Come on Hackney - commercial waste collections ARE NOT WORKING - not on Pellerin and especially not on Stoke Newington rd
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There seems to be someone living in an abandoned vechicle, 12th October
item.description:
An individual and his dog has been living in an abandoned red van at the start of Parkwood road. As residents we feel very uncomfortable, and the fact there is a school present just opposite the road. The issue has been there around a week roughly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Parkwood Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
